manifest.changelog:
* Redesigned Reels countdown timer
* Enabled Reels auto-scroll (Hands-free mode)
* Updated UI elements
* Removed faulty flags
* Changed profile layout 
* Improved overall stability
* Updated versioning format: Previously used v9.1, v9.2, v9.3, etc. Now using v9, v10, v11, etc.
